subject: Uniforms
Fashion and Apparel
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Professional critics weigh in on the United States team’s outfits for the Olympic opening and closing ceremonies, with some seeing a bold, patriotic statement and others seeing garish Christmas sweaters.
snippet: Professional critics weigh in on the United States team’s outfits for the Olympic opening and closing ceremonies, with some seeing a bold, patriotic statement and others seeing garish Christmas sweaters.
